title: Campbell will acquire Rao's premium sauces parent company for $2.7 billion
description: Campbell acquires Sovos Brands to expand its portfolio of premium brands, anchored by Rao’s and noosa.

title: Appeals court upholds Josh Duggar's conviction for downloading child sex abuse images
description: A federal appeals court has upheld Josh Duggar's conviction for downloading child sexual abuse images

title: NYC plans to house migrants on an island in the East River
description: New York Mayor Eric Adams says the city will house as many as 2,000 migrants on an island in the East River where a migrant center was set up last year and then taken down weeks later

title: Florida man charged with flooding emergency room after attacking nurse and stripping
description: A man in southwest Florida has been charged with flooding a hospital’s emergency rooms after attacking a nurse and stripping off his clothes

title: Teen said 'homophobic slurs' before O'Shae Sibley killing: Criminal complaint
description: The teen charged in O'Shae Sibley's death said homophobic slurs before stabbing, according to the criminal complaint.

title: WATCH:  Fireballs erupt from burning manufacturing plant in Garland, Texas
description: Multiple fireballs erupted from a burning manufacturing plant in Garland, Texas, eyewitness footage showed.

title: Judge rejects Trump's counterclaim against E. Jean Carroll
description: A federal judge in New York has rejected former President Trump's counterclaim against writer E. Jean Carroll, who successfully sued him for defamation.

title: 'The Exorcist,' 'The French Connection' director William Friedkin dead at 87
description: William Friedkin, director of "The Exorcist" and "The French Connection," has died at age 87.

title: Thousands in Haiti march to demand safety from violent gangs as killings and kidnappings soar
description: Several thousand people marched, faces covered to conceal their identities.

title: Missouri man sentenced to prison for killing that went unsolved for decades
description: A Missouri man has been sentenced to 10 years in prison, nearly four decades after a woman was strangled with her body dumped in the woods

title: Former FBI agent to plead guilty in oligarch-related case
description: Charles McGonigal was charged over his ties to Oleg Deripaska

title: Ex-Minneapolis officer sentenced to nearly 5 years for role in George Floyd’s death
description: Tou Thao, the last former Minneapolis police officer convicted in state court for his role in the killing of George Floyd, has been sentenced to 4 years and 9 months

title: Tesla CFO Zachary Kirkhorn steps down, will remain with company through year's end
description: Tesla Chief Financial Officer Zachary Kirkhorn has left the company after 13 years with the the electric vehicle and solar panel maker

title: At least 12 people were injured in a blast at a port in northwest Turkey
description: Turkish officials say at least 12 people have been injured in an explosion at a port in the country's northwest

title: Elon Musk says he may need surgery before proposed 'cage match' with Mark Zuckerberg
description: Elon Musk says he may need to get surgery before a proposed “cage match” with Mark Zuckerberg

title: Tyson Foods closing 4 chicken processing plants in cost-cutting move
description: Tyson Foods Inc. is closing four chicken processing plants as it looks to lower costs

title: 8-year-old Chicago girl fatally shot by man upset with kids making noise: Witnesses
description: An 8-year-old Chicago girl riding a scooter was fatally shot in the head

title: Woman arrested in plot to assassinate Zelenskyy, Ukraine says
description: A woman has been detained by Ukraine’s Security Service in connection with an apparent plot to attack President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the service said on Monday.

title: Migrants moved to barge moored in southern UK as government seeks to cut costs
description: A small group of asylum-seekers has been moved to a barge moored in southern England as the government tries to cut the cost of sheltering a rising number of people arriving in the country

title: Illinois to ban advertising for guns allegedly marketed to kids and militants
description: Illinois will soon outlaw advertising for firearms that officials determine produce a public safety threat or appeals to children, militants or others who might later use the weapons illegally

title: Storms spawning tornadoes in America's Heartland head for East Coast: Latest forecast
description: Stormy weather spawned tornadoes, triggered flash flooding, knocked out power and uprooted trees across the United States over the weekend.

title: England advances over Nigeria on penalty kicks despite red card at Women's World Cup
description: England won despite a red card that ejected star Lauren James to beat Nigeria on penalty kicks and advance to the quarterfinals at the Women’s World Cup

title: Trucking giant Yellow Corp. declares bankruptcy after years of financial struggles
description: Trucking company Yellow Corp. has declared bankruptcy after years of financial struggles and growing debt

title: Possible explosion at Sherwin-Williams plant in Texas, police say
description: At least one person was injured in a possible explosion at a Sherwin-Williams facility in Texas early Monday, authorities said.

title: Saudi Arabian oil giant Aramco reports $30B in Q2 profits, down nearly 40%
description: Saudi state-run oil giant Aramco made $30 billion in profit in the second quarter, a nearly 40% decline from the same period the previous year

title: Suicide bomber prematurely detonates explosives in Pakistan, killing couple
description: Officials say a suicide bomber apparently detonated his explosive-laden vehicle prematurely in a former stronghold of the Pakistani Taliban, killing a married couple in a nearby car

title: 3 dead in firefighting helicopter crash after midair collision with 2nd helicopter
description: A Cal Fire helicopter crashed, killing all three crew members, after it collided with a second helicopter while fighting a blaze in southern California.

title: 4-year-old run over by golf cart after dog accidentally rests on pedal
description: A 4-year-old was uninjured Friday night after being run over by a golf cart after a dog laid down on the go pedal, according to fire department officials in Michigan.
